desc: At Ava & Coco our range is guaranteed to keep a child busy for hours with small world play and sensory activities Our range includes a selection of small premium playdough kits, mega premium playdough kits, themed sensory bins, party favours, silicone jewellery, resin number and letter sets, sensory rice & waterbeads

layout.text: We are two sisters and mums to six kids. Our little ones range from 10 months to 9 years. All products have been activities we love to do with our kids and hope they will bring just as much fun and happiness to yours.
